oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1947-05-24 - Minnie Pearl performance - WSM
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Excerpts from a Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from May 24, 1947. Featuring Minnie Pearl on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Minnie Pearl
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening theme (incomplete) -- Minnie Pearl talks -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl) -- Closing theme (incomplete)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Grand ole opry (Radio program); Minnie Pearl; Cannon, Sarah Ophelia, 1912-1996;
